maqras.text: 52|24|Va navcavonone [ki ʙaroi xidmat] peromunason dar raftu omadand, gui [az zeʙoi va sapedrui] hamcun marvoride dar sadaf hastand
52|25|[Bihistijon] Ba jakdigar ru meovarand va az [dunjo va ahvoli guzastai] xud suol mekunand
52|26|Megujand: «Mo dar dunjo dar xonavodai xud [az azoʙi ilohi] metarsidem
52|27|Alloh taolo [ʙo ne'mti islom] ʙar mo minnat nihod va az azoʙi suzon [-i duzax] hifzamon kard
52|28|Mo dar zindagii dunjo hamvora Uro [parastis mekardem va ʙa ruʙuʙijat] mexondem. Be tardid, U nakukoru mehruʙon ast
52|29|Pas, [ej Pajomʙar, ʙo ojoti Qur'on ʙa mardum] andarz ʙideh, ki ʙa lutfi Parvardigorat [tu ʙar xilofi iddaoi kofiron] na kohini va na macnun
52|30|Ojo megujand: «[Muhammad] Soirest, ki muntazirem, to margas faro rasad [va az suxanonas rahoi joʙem]?»
52|31|Bigu: «Muntazir [-i margi man] ʙosed; man niz ʙo sumo muntazir xoham mond [to azoʙatonro ʙa casm ʙinam]»
52|32|Ojo aqlhojason ʙa [ʙajoni] in [suxanoni ʙotil] hukm mekunad, jo [asosan] mardume sarkas hastand
52|33|Ojo megujand: «[Muhammad] Qur'onro ca'l kardaast?». [Hargiz cunin nest] Balki [ƣarq dar takaʙʙurand, ki] imon nameovarand
52|34|Agar rost megujand, suxane monandi on ʙijovarand
52|35|Ojo onon az hec ofarida sudaand jo xud ofarinandai xesand
52|36|Ojo onon osmonho va zaminro ofaridaand? [Na] Balki onon jaqin nadorand [ki Alloh taolo ofarinandai mutlaq ast]
52|37|Ojo gancinahoi [ne'mat va hidojati] Parvardigorat nazdi eson ast? Ojo [ʙar hama ciz] tasallut dorand
52|38|Ojo nardʙone dorand, ki ʙa vasilai on [guftori faristagoni vahjro] mesunavand? Pas, har ki sunidaast, ʙojad dalele ravsan ʙijovarad
52|39|Ojo Alloh taolo farzandoni duxtar dorad va sumo pisar
52|40|[Ej pajomʙar] Ojo az onon podose darxost mekuni, ki [az pardoxtas dar rancand va xarcas] ʙarojason [garonu] sangin ast
52|41|Ojo az ilmi ƣajʙ ogohand va [xaʙarhoi nihonro] menavisand
52|42|Ojo qasdi najrang[va naqsai palide ʙarojat] dorand? Vale kofiron xud giriftori najrang [va tadʙiri ilohi] hastand
52|43|Ojo onon ma'ʙude ƣajr az Alloh taolo dorand? Alloh taolo az on ci ʙo U sarik qaror medihand, poku munazzah ast
52|44|[In kofiron, hatto] Agar porae az osmonro niz dar holi suqut ʙuʙinand, [ʙoz ham imon nameovarand va] megujand: «Aʙre mutarokim ast»
52|45|Pas, ononro [ʙa holi xud] raho kun, to ʙo ruzi mav'udason, ki [ʙo naxustin damidani sur] madhusi marg megardand, muvoceh savand
52|46|Ruze, ki najrangason sudmand naxohad ʙud va [az hec su] jori namesavand
52|47|Sitamgoron [dar dunjo niz ʙa dasti mu'minon] ʙa azoʙi digare giriftor xohand sud; vale ʙestarason namedonand
52|48|[Ej Pajomʙar] Dar ʙaroʙari hukmi Parvardigorat sikeʙo ʙos; zero tu tahti nazar va hifozati Moi; va hangome ki [az xoʙ jo ʙa qasdi iʙodat] ʙarmexezi, Parvardigoratro ʙa poki sitois kun
52|49|Va niz [dar pose] az saʙ Uro sitois kun [va namoz ʙiguzor] va ʙa hangomi nopadid sudani sitoragon [dar sapedadam niz namozi suʙh ʙiguzor]
53|1|Savgand ʙa sitora, on goh ki nopadid savad
53|2|Ki jori sumo [Muhammad] hargiz gumroh nasuda va ʙa rohi taʙohe naaftodaast
53|3|Va az ruji havoi nafs suxan namegujad
53|4|[In Qur'on] Vahj [-i ilohi] ast, ki [ʙa u] ilqo mesavad. In [Qur'on] cuz pand ʙaroi cahonijon [inson va cin] nest
53|5|[Caʙrail, ki faristae ast] Purtavon ta'limas dodaast
53|6|[Hamon faristai] Xusmanzare, ki [ʙo cehrai haqiqias dar ʙaroʙari Pajomʙar] istod
53|7|Dar hole ki u dar ufuqi ʙolo [dar osmon] qaror dost
53|8|Sipas [Caʙrail] nazdik sud; va nazdiktar
53|9|Pas, [fosilai u ʙo Pajomʙar] ʙa andozai tuli du kamon kamtar ʙud
53|10|On goh [on faristai ʙuzurgvor] on ciro, ki ʙojad ʙa ʙandai Alloh taolo vahj mekard, vahj namud
53|11|On ciro, ki [pajomʙar] did, qalʙas duruƣ napindost
53|12|Ojo ʙo u dar ʙorai on ci meʙinad, mucodala mekuned
53|13|Dar haqiqat, pajomʙar jak ʙori digar niz on faristaro [ʙa surati komil] musohida karda ʙud
53|14|Dar kanori [daraxti ʙuzurg] «Sidratu-l-muntaho» [dar osmoni haftum]
53|15|ki oromisgohi ʙihist hamon cost
53|16|On goh ki holate on daraxtro pusonida ʙud
53|17|Casmi [pajomʙar ʙa capu rost] munharif nasud va [az had] tacovuz nakard
53|18|Ba rosti, ki u ʙarxe az ʙuzurgtarin nisonahoi Parvardigorasro [dar on co] musohida kard
53|19|[Ej musrikon] Ojo «Lot»-u «Uzzo»-ro didaed
53|20|Va «Mannot» on savumin [ʙuti ʙearzis]-ro? [Ojo hec sudu zijone ʙa sumo merasonand]
53|21|Ojo [iddao mekuned, ki] farzandi pisar ʙaroi sumost va duxtar ʙaroi Alloh taolo
53|22|Dar in surat, taqsime noodilona ast

53|23|In ʙutho faqat ismhoe [ʙema'no] hastand, ki xud va padaronaton ʙo onho [ma'ʙudhoi duruƣini xudro] nom nihodaed va Alloh taolo hec dalele [ʙar haqqonijati in kor] nozil nakardaast. [Musrikon dar e'tiqodotason] Faqat pajravi gumonu xostahoi dili xesand; hol on ki [muciʙoti] hidojat az coniʙi Parvardigorason ʙar onon rasidaast
53|24|Ojo inson har ci [az safoati in ma'ʙudoni ʙotil] orzu kunad, ʙarojas mujassar ast
53|25|Dunjo va oxirat az oni Alloh ast [va ʙa har kas, har ciro saloh ʙidonad meʙaxsad]
